ts.description: Unix timestamp given in milliseconds when the data was sampled

seq.description: Sequence number of the message. This is a counter, used for ordering message if `ts` not available/used

domain.description: Enumeration representing the source from which the message was sent from

lvl.description: Enumeration of the log level of message: [1: ERR, 2: WRN, 3: INF, 4: DBG]

message.description: The message data that was logged
